thread.title: Booking Holdings, Formerly Priceline, Sees Boost in Travel Bookings

author: Imani Moise
title: Booking Holdings, Formerly Priceline, Sees Boost in Travel Bookings
text:
Booking Holdings Inc., formerly known as Priceline Group, reported higher-than-expected sales in its latest quarter as the online travel company got a boost from a rise in bookings and strong performance at its international operations.
The online travel company, which operates Agoda.com, Priceline.com and Kayak.com in addition to its namesake website, has been warning of more modest revenue growth after years of rapid expansion as its online brands mature, though the websites continue to generate massive profits. The company... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
